name: So basic
description:
Summary:
In this kata we want to communiate with a Mayan accountant.

Scenario:
You work for the IRS and have been sent the 1040 form for a local Mayan retailer.
The Mayan apparently speaks perfect English but has accidentally filled out his Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) in Mayan.


Task:
Generate a javascript method that converts a base-20 value into its decimal equivalent. If it cannot be done, return -1.
